node.title: More than 80 guests in lockdown at Byron Bay backpackers after confirmed COVID case
node.description: The Member for Ballina says a Byron Bay hostel is going into a lockdown due to a positive COVID case at the venue.
node.content:
["A backpacker hostel in Byron Bay on the NSW\u00a0north coast has been placed into a snap seven-day lockdown after a positive COVID\u00a0case and 84 close contacts were identified.", "Ballina MP Tamara Smith said\u00a0police were\u00a0monitoring the Aquarius Backpackers in Byron Bay to ensure no guest\u00a0leaves the facility.", "NSW Health are yet to confirm details about the situation to the ABC, but the local MP says she was informed about the development by local police, who ABC have contacted for comment.", "The news came as thousands of school students descended on the north coast for the traditional schoolies celebrations.", "Ms Smith says food and health support is being provided to the dozens of guests who are now in lockdown at the backpackers.", "Ms Smith posted at statement\u00a0about the situation to her verified Facebook page on Wednesday night.", "\"I'm closely monitoring a situation in Byron Bay where a positive COVID-19 case and 84 close contacts have been identified at Aquarius Backpackers in Byron Bay,\" her statement read.", "\"Police are monitoring compliance 24/7 over the next seven days.", "\"My thoughts are with everyone in that situation as it will be a tough time and I will keep checking to make sure that people are getting the support they need.\"", "", "
Thousands of travellers have flocked to Byron Bay for the annual schoolies celebrations.\u00a0(Samantha Turnbull: ABC North Coast.)
", "Ms Smith told the ABC that everyone staying in the backpackers is\u00a0presumably\u00a0fully vaccinated, though she remains concerned for the welfare of guests.", "\"Because you can't come to regional New South Wales without being fully vaccinated,\" she said.", "", "
A sign at a COVID testing centre in Byron Bay earlier this year.(ABC News: Jen King)
", "Ms Smith\u00a0said any further spread of the infection would be \"pretty catastrophic\" for the region.\u00a0 The Byron Shire has one of the lowest vaccination rates in NSW and businesses are\u00a0still recovering from two lockdowns in August and September this year.", "\"It's schoolies at the moment and we have 16 flights a day coming into the Byron Ballina gateway airport. Everyone has been flocking to our region,\" she said.", "\"We want to make sure that the situation is contained and that people are safe and getting the support they need.", "\"The real concern is\u00a0the contacts of 85 people and how many people they've seen.", "\"If that starts to spread out, then that's very concerning for our little community if we go into a bigger lockdown because everyone's starting to get back on their feet.\"", "", "
Ballina MP Tamara Smith said any further spread of the virus would be \"catastrophic\" for the region.\u00a0(Samantha Turnbull: ABC North Coast.)
", "The night manager at Aquarius Backpackers declined to give any information.", "\"No comment,\" he said, adding that he was not authorised by the owners to speak.", "The hostel has dormitory accommodation as well as private rooms.", "Guest facilities include a swimming pool, a restaurant and cafe and an outdoor bar.", "The hostel is on Lawson Street in the centre of Byron Bay,\u00a0a short walk from Main Beach."]
